alert.note: Alert for Pribilof Islands (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 20 at 4:34PM AKST until January 21 at 9:00AM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM AKST FRIDAY FOR THE PRIBILOF ISLANDS... * WHAT...Blowing snow occurring. Northeast winds 25 to 35 mph. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. Total snow accumulations of up to 2 inches. * WHERE...Pribilof Islands. * WHEN...Until 9 AM AKST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow will reduce visibility to a half mile. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Occasional snow showers and gusty winds are expected for the Pribilof Islands tonight as cold, Arctic air surges southward across the Bering Sea. Conditions are expected to improve Friday morning as snow showers taper off with decreasing winds.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
